trophies.trophyDetail: You've done it! You've earned every trophy in the game and proved yourself to be a true fishing legend. Congratulations on your incredible achievement!

Congratulations! You have become a true master of the fishing basics, and earned this trophy by completing the tutorial. You can now put your newfound knowledge to work and start reeling in some big catches!
You're off to a great start! You have already purchased 20 floats to help you lure in your catch. With your dedication and attention to detail, you're sure to become a fishing pro in no time.
You know that the right bait can make all the difference when it comes to catching fish. By purchasing 20 bait, you've shown that you're willing to go the extra mile to ensure a successful catch.
You understand that a good fishing setup requires careful planning and organization. By purchasing 20 grids, you've demonstrated your skill in preparing for any fishing situation.
You're always ready for your next fishing trip, and you've shown that by refueling your ship 5 times. Your dedication to your craft is sure to pay off with some impressive catches.
You're making a name for yourself in the fishing world! By selling 150 crabs and lobsters, you've proven that you're a skilled and successful fisherman.

As they say, nothing is certain except death and taxes. By paying taxes for 15 penalties, you've shown that you understand the importance of staying on top of your finances and managing your resources wisely.
You have a keen eye and steady hand when it comes to catching crabs and lobsters. By collecting 300 of these elusive creatures, you've shown that you're a true fishing expert.
You know that you can never have too many floats when it comes to fishing. By purchasing 50 of them, you've proven that you're serious about maximizing your chances of catching the big one.
You've expanded your bait collection and purchased 50 of them. Your dedication to your craft is admirable and you're sure to attract some impressive catches.
You understand the importance of having the right gear for any fishing situation. By purchasing 50 grids, you're showing that you're always prepared for any challenge.
You're always ready for your next adventure on the water. By refueling your ship 15 times, you're demonstrating your commitment to your craft and your love for the sport of fishing.
You've proven that you're a skilled fisherman and savvy businessman. By selling 500 crabs and lobsters, you're making a name for yourself in the fishing world.

You're a master of financial management and resource allocation. By paying taxes for 30 penalties, you're demonstrating your ability to stay on top of your finances and keep your business running smoothly.
You have a true passion for catching crabs and lobsters, and it shows. By collecting 600 of these fascinating creatures, you're becoming a true expert in the art of fishing.
You've gone above and beyond in your pursuit of the perfect catch. By buying 100 floats, you're showing that you're willing to invest in the best equipment to make it happen.
You're a master of bait selection. By buying 100 baits, you're proving that you know what it takes to lure in the biggest and best catches.
You've got a keen eye for detail and a talent for organization. By buying 100 grids, you're demonstrating that you know how to optimize your fishing operation for maximum efficiency and success.
You're not afraid to go the extra mile (or nautical mile, as it were) to get the job done. By refueling 30 times, you're showing that you're willing to go the distance to reach your fishing goals.
You're a true fishing mogul! By selling 1000 crabs and lobsters, you're proving that you're a master of your craft and know how to turn your catches into big profits.

You understand that paying taxes is a necessary part of doing business, and you're not afraid to take on the burden. By paying taxes for 50 penalties, you're showing that you're a responsible and successful fisherman.

You're a true expert in the art of fishing. By collecting 1000 crabs and lobsters in total, you're demonstrating that you're a master of your craft and that you have an eye for detail and a talent for catching the biggest and best fish.
You're a true master of the seas! By unlocking all ships, you're showing that you're a seasoned captain who can handle any vessel and any fishing challenge.
